search_query: The Trade Desk competitors 2015 programmatic advertising DSP
context: By 2015, The Trade Desk had established itself as a leading independent DSP, earning recognition as one of Forbes' top 10 America's Most Promising Companies. Founders Jeff Green and Dave Pickles were named Ernst & Young Entrepreneurs of The Year 2015 in Greater Los Angeles. The programmatic advertising industry had matured significantly since 2011-2012 when RTB became mainstream. In Forrester's Q2 2015 Wave Report evaluating DSPs, The Trade Desk was named a 'Leader' alongside AOL, DataXu, Turn, and AppNexus. The industry was consolidating around key platforms, with clear differentiation between walled gardens (Google, Facebook) and independent DSPs emphasizing transparency and open access.
